title: Don't Think Twice
description: Biting humor with heart makes this a perfect paperback for teenage girls.Anne Harper, a seventeen-year-old with a hard-hitting, yet hilarious, sense of sarcasm, is living in a group home for pregnant teenagers. As the weeks pass, she comes to realize that what is growing inside her is not just a child, but also a new awareness of herself.
author: Ruth Pennebaker
